description: Downloads and runs sharpup, evading applocker.

customAttributes.name: callbackURL
customAttributes.description: Executable will call back and execute the executable here.

customAttributes.name: commandlineArguments
customAttributes.description: Pass arguments to the executable. Should looks like this ["-c","-b value","-a"]. Note the -a and -c is a switch with no value.

customAttributes.name: compile
customAttributes.description: Whether or not to compile. Y/N

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of file to be created, can be full path or just a name
